name: ModerateOrSevereImpairmentBetterEyeProfoundImpairmentLesserEye
title: Moderate or Severe Impairment, Better Eye, Profound Impairment Lesser Eye
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a diagnosis of moderate or severe impairment in one eye with profound impairment in the other eye.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with a diagnosis of blindness in one eye of categories 3, 4 or 5 with low vision in the other eye of categories 1 or 2.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that pertain to 'unspecified eye.')
